name: Sergio Sighinolfi
introduction: Sergio Sighinolfi (born 25 April 1925 and died 7 September 1956) was an Italian racing driver who raced mainly in sports cars. In 1952, he entered some non-championship races with Scuderia Marzotto and later with the works-Ferrari team. He was a substitute driver at the 1952 French Grand Prix for Scuderia Marzotto, but was not required to drive.
